text: Video: Pro tips on how to winterize your home to keep pipes from freezing - - Updated Currently in Tulsa 44° Clear 52° / 28° 6 PM 45° 7 PM 42° 8 PM 39° 9 PM 36° 10 PM 34° Follow Fox23 Trending - [TPD issue arrest warrant for Tulsa bride-to-be featured in FOX23 Investigation](/news/local/tpd-issue-arrest-warrant-for-tulsa-bride-to-be-featured-in-fox23-investigation/article_2180f2fc-a993-11ee-aa41-7f4152a8b4e5.html) - [OMMA says licensed medical marijuana dispensary workers must get new credential starting Jan. 1](/news/omma-says-licensed-medical-marijuana-dispensary-workers-must-get-new-credential-starting-jan-1/article_c64c56b8-a51b-11ee-aafd-d3274310bcd8.html) - [Man arrested in connection to deadly shooting at Woodland Hills Mall set to appear in court](/news/man-arrested-in-connection-to-deadly-shooting-at-woodland-hills-mall-set-to-appear-in/article_1e6a30ae-a44f-11ee-9812-ab7476b26cc2.html) - [Tulsa family looking for little girl who left them special Christmas letter in their mailbox](/news/local/tulsa-family-looking-for-little-girl-who-left-them-special-christmas-letter-in-their-mailbox/article_3c42c04e-a8ed-11ee-b40a-673a3b7c8b74.html) - [Police investigating Tulsa's first 2024 homicide, 12-year-old shot and killed at midtown Tulsa home](/news/police-investigating-tulsas-first-2024-homicide-12-year-old-shot-and-killed-at-midtown-tulsa/article_92c75880-a96a-11ee-85a5-7bcb6df2a0e1.html) © Copyright 2024 [Imagicomm Communications, LLC](/)2625 S Memorial Dr, Tulsa, OK | [Terms of Use](/site/terms.html)| [Privacy Policy](/site/privacy.html) Powered by
